info.name: YouTube Modern 2020
info.description: Modernize YouTube with a new clean, simple, and compact UI.
info.additionalInfo:
Details:
To open the toolbar/search-bar, hover your mouse over the top of the page.

If you have any questions, bugs, or recommendations, please comment below and let me know! Thanks - Arctic Fox

(1/6/20) Version Release 1.1.0:
- Removed Tab Bar To Increase Content Viewing Space
- Added Copyright
- Bug Fixes

(1/1/20) Version Release 1.0.0:
 - Released
